design_philosophy.style: High-energy Framer-style minimalism with Space Grotesk + enhanced glass surfaces in true black theme with cyan/blue/purple accents
design_philosophy.approach: Generous whitespace, sophisticated shadows, dynamic micro-interactions, gradient accent colors, 3D effects
design_philosophy.brand: Engineer-creative balance - technical but human with modern, interactive aesthetic
design_philosophy.performance: Mobile-first, optimized images, smooth transitions, loading states, reduced motion support
design_philosophy.accessibility: WCAG AA compliant with proper focus states, touch targets, and motion preferences
design_philosophy.v3_0_features: Framer-style animations, custom cursor, tech badges, floating elements, enhanced glassmorphism, scroll-triggered effects

v3_0_enhancements.framer_style_animations: Scroll-triggered animations, staggered text effects, 3D card interactions
v3_0_enhancements.custom_cursor: Gradient circle cursor with position tracking and hover interactions
v3_0_enhancements.tech_badge_system: Categorized gradient badges with icons and pop-in animations
v3_0_enhancements.enhanced_glassmorphism: Stronger backdrop-blur effects with cyan accent tints
v3_0_enhancements.floating_elements: Animated gradient blobs and organic dividers with multiple variants
v3_0_enhancements.interactive_filters: Morphing background tabs with spring physics animations
v3_0_enhancements.advanced_hover_effects: Ripple effects, magnetic hover, 3D tilt, and enhanced shadows
v3_0_enhancements.ambient_mesh_backgrounds: Multi-layer animated gradient meshes with cursor interaction
v3_0_enhancements.accessibility_improvements: Reduced motion support and mobile-optimized animations
v3_0_enhancements.performance_optimization: Lazy loading, will-change hints, and intersection observer usage
